title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 19 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 19 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Clay and Buck welcome the founder of Black Rifle Coffee, former Green Beret Evan Hafer, to clarify the recent New York Times hit-piece. This is an attempt to make any small business seem right wing. The news media is now open propaganda warfare on anything that doesn't follow the narrative. Rep. Nicole Malliotakis rips AOC as a "communist sympathizer" after Cuba remarks. 1619 Project founder Nikole Hannah-Jones: Cuba is the most equal multiracial country in our hemisphere... And that's largely due to socialism. The L.A. mask mandate is going to spread to other cities.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
